name: Hand Guillotine
description:
Would you risk it for $$$?

This game is your next favorite time killer!

◉ Grab as much money as you can by avoiding multiple guillotines on each level!
◉ Hold to start grabbing the bucks and release in right time to dodge the dangerous blades!
◉ Don't let your arm be cut!

How many levels are YOU able to pass?
Get rich or die trying!
